description.value: You fire a projectile into the air with your weapon ikon, which becomes a shower in a @Template[type:burst|distance:5] within 60 feet. Each creature in the area must succeed at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classDC.value)|basic:true] save against your class DC or take spirit damage equal to your normal Strike damage with your weapon ikon. If your weapon ikon has the deadly or fatal trait, when a creature critically fails their save against this effect, roll the spirit damage they take using the adjusted Strike damage those traits would normally apply to your weapon. You can choose before using this ability to give it the nonlethal trait, in which case reducing a creature to 0 Hit Points merely places them into a dreamless slumber.
